entry.title: Kool-Aid Drink Mix Cherry - 48 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kool-Aid
Type: Snacks
Price: 19.00

Be Cool with Kool-Aid Cherry Drink Mix

Keep your family and friends hydrated with the Kool-Aid Cherry Unsweetened Drink Mix. This tiny packet makes two quarts of a delicious thirst-quenching drink. Just add water and your preferred sweetener. Since one packet serves eight, a couple of large pitchers will please your guests at parties. You can also fill a beverage dispenser to satisfy family and friends at picnics and barbecues. Try out different creative recipes. Freeze the liquid and make slushies or pour some into ice trays to make lemonade cubes. Put the frozen cubes in drinks or munch on them. You can even mix it with other flavours to make your own unique drink. The flavoured drink mix is caffeine and gluten-free. It also provides a good source of vitamin C. 
Kool-Aid Cherry Unsweetened Drink Mix:

  • Makes 2 quarts
  • Good source of vitamin C
  • Caffeine-free
  • Gluten-free
  • Kosher
